I have a small work around for this

How to reproduce for testing:
- Go in the team perspective (CVS repositories)
- in the view CVS repositories select a c file in a head or any branch
- try to open it, you will end up with NPE
*** Bug 175896 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
